1. ESERCIZIO ENCRYPTION/DECRYPTION
	p = 885320963		q = 238855417
	m = 30120		e = 9007

2. DATI n E phi(n) TROVARE p,q
	n = 84773093		phi(n) = 84754668

3. BRUTE FORCING PER TROVARE p,q DATA n
	n = 166788761

	n = 171405041

4. COMMON MODULUS ATTACK
        n = 33
        e1 = 7
        e2 = 19
        c1 = 26
        c2 = 5
        
5. TROVA p, q, d
        n:=50099920243534185902030384050691267779347783497642615288369
